channel.title: Posts on Alexis's Final Project
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Alexis's Final Project

item.title: extremely simple python and r coding demonstration
item.description: how are you doing today? i may be an extremely new coder, but i can show you some simple code to demontrate how python and R can work together using reticulate. first, in R, we will run this code: library(reticulate) Alexis <- "I love" then, in python, we will run this code: Salim="food and cooking" print(r.Alexis, Salim) ## I love food and cooking pretty cool, it took something from R and put it into the python chunk to print out a sentence

item.title: test post and introduction (for fun)!
item.description: hello, how are you doing? i not be a great blogger or coder, but i had a great time going outside of my comfort zone for this class. i quickly wanted to plug my org, the austin meal movement: we are the only cooking and food organization on campus, and we have a great time getting together and learning with others. if you would like to learn more, donâ€™t hesitate to contact me!
